message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I'm looking to spend a little less. Would you be willing to do $8,500?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $8,800. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product.
